department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Dennis Stone works at DePaul University in Chicago Illinois as a web developer at the College of Law. Previously he has worked in the development department at marchFIRST, an international systems integrator and internet consulting company.<br><br>Dennis Stone is has many years of experience as user experience architect with a track record for managing complex processes and projects resulting in customer-facing features and functionality that engenders user adoption and loyalty as well as sustainable competitive advantage. He is a team player whose skills have been tested and proven in the design and implementation of creative solutions, requiring cross-organizational collaboration for mid size clients to fortune 100 companies.<br><br>He possesses a unique combination of technical expertise in web-based design and development technologies/processes and business insight that provide tangible results for clients.<br>
